runs.comm: doesn't give any room as the ball nips in from back of length, he stays back and manages some bat to defend
bit too short on the leg side and he pulls that effortlessly behind square with his right leg in the air, for four
back of length with the angle outside off, punched to cover point
short of length towards the hips, tucked behind square on leg for one
comes down, Dawlat bowls a slower one and he only manages an edge back to the bowler
back of length and coming in, he manages to get some bat and defends to cover
pulls the short ball from outside off, the shot is mistimed and the ball goes back to the bowler
on length on the off stump, pushed into the covers for one
fullish on the off stump, tucked to square leg and the fielder dives to his left to save one
length delivery again and it's flicked to midwicket
tucks the ball to backward square leg again and this time they sneak in a single despite a low and flat throw
too full on the stumps, launched straight down the ground over long-on for a clean six!
slightly flatter and angled in, he wants to cut off the back foot and finds a bottom edge
back of length just outside off, tucked towards midwicket for one
short ball on off, he pulls and misses as the ball goes under the bat
length delivery on the stumps, slogged to mid-on for one
nips it in from outside off, back of length, and he's trapped on the back foot but just outside off
caught at mid-on, Myburgh is gone! He wanted to clear mid-on after the ball pitched on length on the stumps, he didn't get the middle of the bat and it was an easy catch for Stanikzai
bit of movement for the length delivery on off, Copper defends it carefully into the covers
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot to third man
goes to the off side and absolutely smacks that short ball over midwicket for a four!
run-out chance missed! He cut the ball to point and said no for the single but Cooper was halfway down the pitch and Hassan could not collect the ball at bowler's end
punches the full delivery, after coming down, to mid off for one
angled in from outside off, flicks it nicely towards deep midwicket and they run well to come back for the second
mistimes the length delivery from off stump to the leg side
full delivery on the stumps, driven down to mid on and a fumble gives them a single
misses the free hit as he drives outside off and misses the full delivery
how did he do that? Back of length outside off, he comes forward and slams that over the covers for a clean six!
touch back of length outside off and he swipes that over backward point for two
fullish on off stump, mistimes the drive to the leg side
moves to off and pushes the length delivery down to mid on
clears the ropes again! Got a length delivery on off stump and tonked that over the long on boundary for a six!
slower and wider outside off, he cuts it nicely but straight to point
not that bad a ball but he launches that high in the air again, goes very high and lands over the ropes again, towards the wide long on boundary
full outside off, driven firmly to cover
length delivery on the leg stump, swept straight to short fine leg
fullish on leg, pushed down to mid on
fullish outside off, driven down to long off for one
slow full toss on leg stump, worked down to long on for one
pretty full on off stump, flicked on the leg side for one more
back of length and angling in, a run after the ball deflects off the bat and back pad on the off side
looks to heave on the leg side, it wasn't that short or full, and he takes it on the body
fullish outside off, driven down to long off for one
low full toss on off stumps, pushed down to long off easily
yorker on the middle stump, flicked to the leg side nicely and they come back for two
low full toss on off, swiped wide of backward point to third man for two
full on the off stump, driven down to mid off now
creamed through the covers! Full outside off, he nearly went down on a knee and drove it in the air, wide of cover for four
fulllish on the off stump, driven down to long off for one
slow, short and on leg stump, he fails to put it away

easy peasy catch at long off! It was full outside off, Cooper lofted that straight down the ground, no idea why with the field spread out, and long off got under that easily. They check for the no ball and it's fine
goes on the back foot and manages a run after an edge on the off side
full on middle, flicked down to long on for one
loud loud appeal for lbw as he tries to paddle sweep and the ball goes down leg, umpire says no!
darts it in towards middle stump and he goes back to turn it to leg
nearly in the block hole outside off, he reaches out and misses
back of length outside off, he looks to cut and misses again

oh, that's a horrible mix up! Swart drove the full delivery through the covers towards wide long off and turned back for the second, so did Barresi but he took a couple of steps before saying no. Swart was a long way down by then and an accurate throw makes him go back
looks to punch off the back foot and gets an inner edge over the stumps to the keeper
back of length and angling in, tucked to midwicket
thick edge off the drive goes to third man for one
slides it in towards middle stump, helps to long on for one
tries a reverse sweep on his first ball and manages an edge to the leg side to short fine leg
reaches out and defends the length ball on off
short of length and turning away, he goes back and opens the bat late to cut it fine. Bit of a misfield before Najib slides to keep it inside the boundary
goes in the crease and gets an edge behind square on off, and gets one

leading edge straight to short fine leg, another wicket for Ashraf! It was on length around off, he wanted to sweep it to leg and got a top edge for an easy catch. They are checking for the no ball and Ashraf has actually overstepped!
short and quick outside off, he misses the ball completely. Oh, it's another no ball, can you believe that!
he cashes in now by coming down and launches that over the wide long-on boundary for a six! Long on thought he had a chance but it went over him
pitched up outside off, he gets room and drives that over the cover fielder for a four!
angled in towards off stump, worked towards point for one
short of length towards middle stump, tucked to the leg side for one more
pretty full outside off, thick edge goes down to third man for one
slower one outside off, he helps it to backward point
pushes the incoming delivery to midwicket who throws the ball quickly to bowler's end
appeal for lbw as Barresi comes down and is truck outside the off stump
big appeal for lbw only from the bowler as Barresi tries a reverse sweep, down on one knee, and it hits him around the waist
chips the ball towards midwicket for one
good reaction from Ashraf and good stumping too! Borren came outside the crease and Ashraf bowled it flat and wide, Borren swung and missed, Shahzad did the rest
goes on the back foot and pushes the ball after the turn to cover point for one
well outside off and it keeps a bit low, he turns that down to long on for one
full and outside off, driven late and well stopped by backward point

taken in the deep, Netherlands five down with van der Merwe's wicket! He played that slog-sweep against the turn for the length delivery and went down on a knee to find deep midwicket. Easy catch in the end
turning in from off stump, he helps that to midwicket, the fielder runs in and somehow throws that towards third man to give overthrows
comes down the track and defends it nicely
goes back in the crease and pushes the length ball to long on
goes on the back foot and cuts the ball on off for one
pitched up around off, he sweeps that by stretching his arm and beats deep midwicket for a four!
sweeps again, top edge goes wide of short fine leg for one
fullish on the legs, clipped nicely wide of long on for one

the keeper takes about four seconds to stump him, and he's gone! Seelaar comes down the track and misses the flat ball that Shahzad collects just over the stumps. Seeler starts walking away from the keeper and he dislodges the ball rather easily
slides the ball in towards middle and leg, he cuts it to cover a bit late
pulls the ball turning in to leg and gets a top edge behind square
comes down the track and gets a bottom edge past the keeper to short fine leg

that's a bizarre way for a decision! It was a flat delivery down leg, he swept, the keeper appealed confidently for caught behind and the umpire didn't move. Then raised the finger when the appeal died down
full and well outside off, driven straight to cover
touch closer to off, driven off the back foot again
the yorker does it, eight down! Superb and accurate ball in the block hole with the angle from Hassan, the bat comes down late and Bukhari is bowled
in the block hole again, this time an inside edge goes off the pad on the off side
incoming length delivery towards the stumps, edge goes down to fine leg for one
short ball outside off, Rippon cuts that like a cracker from the middle of the bat past point for a four
slower ball coming in from back of length, he cuts and gets an inside edge near the stumps
waist high full toss on leg, lofted towards fine leg in the gap for two
coming in towards off stump, driven into the covers for one
outside off on length, driven firmly towards wide mid-off for one

poor delivery but what a catch at long-on! Back of the hand slower delivery that was a half-tracker way outside off, van der Gugten pulled it down the ground and Shafiqullah ran in to his left for a great catch diving forward
coming in sharply towards off stump, he manages to slice it to point
full and outside off, he gets ready and then leaves
fullish outside off, driven firmly to deep cover for one
length delivery on off stump, cuts off the back foot to point
turning towards middle from leg, he goes back to defend
much shorter this time, he pulls off the back foot to wide long-on
outside off now, cuts it off the back foot on off for one more
touch shorter on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
right in the block hole and blocks it back
another accurate yorker and he blocks again, can't do anything else with those
full and wide, he drills that through the covers now for a four!
slower ball outside off and it's pulled straight to midwicket for an easy catch
